title: Touch Notifier
tooltip: Read data from a touch sensor and emit sound from the buzzer. Works with an IoT mobile companion app named "Touch Notifier."
description: A Node.js IoT app that illustrates how to read a touch sensor that triggers activating a buzzer, on select Intel IoT development boards. This app will also start a simple web server (on the IoT board) that can be used to communicate via a WebSocket connection. The IoT mobile companion app is named "Touch Notifier" and is a mobile app project that can be found in the "Samples and Demos" section of the "Companion App" part of the "Start a New Project" page (from the Projects tab)
